snippet.title: I Made Silksong But You Can PLAY It
snippet.description:
Tired of waiting for Hollow Knight: Silksong?
Well luckily we got Hollow Knight: Silksong at home, and you guys can play it!

MY GAME ► https://watermaaron.itch.io/horo-nite-melonmelody

Chapters
00:00 - Intro
00:49 - Recap + Controls Improvement
01:20 - Shoutouts
01:33 - Level Design
02:16 - Enemy Design
03:14 - Currency
03:55 - Shop + Dialogue System
04:23 - Map
04:46 - Sound Effects + Voice Acting
05:15 - Scope Creep
05:43 - Arenas
06:09 - Hazards
06:58 - Home Stretch Obstacle
07:32 - Final Boss
08:39 - Reflection
08:56 - Gameplay
11:29 - Outro

Special Thanks:
Music - https://www.youtube.com/@nikdash-4787

If you want to help support me, feel free to subscribe.
Anyways, hope you all have a nice day, happy holidays and wonderful New Year.
